CITRUS II

Citrus II Spray Air Freshener – Original Citrus Blend

UPC(s): 87052129439

Ingredients

  • Name CAS # Function
  • D-Limonene*5989-27-5 Fragrance

*fragrance allergen

  • CA INGREDIENT DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS
  • VISIT CITRUS II WEBSITE
  • DOWNLOAD SDS
Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.

Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.

Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.

CITRUS MAGIC

Citrus Magic Solid Air Freshener – Closet – Cedar Closet

UPC(s): 87052716479

Ingredients

  • Name CAS # Function
  • Water 7732-18-5 Diluent
  • Glycerin 56-81-5 Stabilizer
  • Palmitic Acid 57-10-3 Emulsifier
  • Stearic Acid 57-11-40 Emulsifier
  • Fragrance Withheld Fragrance
  • D-Limonene*5989-27-5 Fragrance
  • Propylene Glycol 57-55-6 Stabilizer
  • Sodium Hydroxide 1310-73-2 pH Adjuster
  • Capric Acid 334-48-5 Emulsifier
  • Lauric Acid 143-07-7 Emulsifier
  • Myristic Acid 544-63-8 Emulsifier
  • Sodium Chloride 7647-14-5 Thickener
  • Sodium Bicarbonate 144-55-8 Odor Absorber

*fragrance allergen

  • CA INGREDIENT DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS
  • VISIT CITRUS MAGIC WEBSITE
  • DOWNLOAD SDS
Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.

Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.

Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.

Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.

TREWAX

Trewax Paste Wax – Clear

UPC(s): 87052721763

Ingredients

  • Name CAS # Function
  • Distillates (Petroleum), Hydrotreated Light 64742-47-8 Solvent
  • Montanic Waxes Withheld Wax
  • Distillates (Petroleum), Hydrotreated Middle 64742-46-7 Solvent
  • Polyethylene 9002-88-4 Wax
  • Alpha Olefin Waxes 131459-42-2 Wax
  • Carnauba Wax 8015-86-9 Wax
  • Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax 63231-60-7 Wax
  • Candelilla Wax 8006-44-8 Wax
  • Microcrystalline Wax 64742-60-5 Wax

*fragrance allergen

  • CA INGREDIENT DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS
  • VISIT TREWAX WEBSITE
  • DOWNLOAD SDS
Product Date Coding

We use Julian Dating on all our products at Beaumont Products. There are 5 digits in a Julian date code, the first two digits correspond to the last two numbers of the year in which the product was manufactured; the last 3 digits correspond to the day the item was produced with days being numbered between 1 and 365. 20001 would mean the item was produced on January 1st, 2020.
